Description:
Detects the execution of "hh.exe" to open ".chm" files.

Author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Dan Beavin), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HH.EXE Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((original_file_name = 'hh.exe' and process_path like '%\hh.exe') and command like '%.chm%')
